experiences.title: Software Engineer Team Lead
experiences.subtitle: SOLIDitech
workDescription: Lead and mentor a team of developers and QA engineers through one-on-one meetings, code reviews, and ongoing support.
Lead a team in developing enterprise level software to automate businesses providing internet services to customers
Design and architect solutions based on client needs, making key architectural decisions.
Spearheaded the design, development, and support of a new instance delivering fibre services to low income households.
Fully automate processes across sales, provisioning, and support, minimizing human intervention.
Integrate with multiple Layer 2 fibre suppliers via REST API and SOAP to deliver fibre services, implementing custom billing and prepaid logic.

experiences.title: Software Project  Lead
experiences.subtitle: SOLIDitech
workDescription: Led large-scale data migrations from legacy SQL databases to the company’s MySQL database.
Developed a fibre service monitoring and support tool to auto-generate support tickets from a mailbox.
Integrated the Netcash billing system, enabling customers to manage billing via prepaid or debit order payments and implemented custom processes for bank statement reconciliation.
Enhanced a multi-layered Java repository, adding core functionality to boost development productivity across teams.
Implemented Google Analytics tracking for customer online shops.
Developed and maintained a fibre feasibility server, providing real-time fibre service availability and product options for specific locations.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: SOLIDitech
workDescription: Developed Java scripts for seamless data migration from CSV files and various SQL databases to the company’s MySQL database.
Integrated with multiple SMS gateways to enhance customer experience during online quote and contract acceptance.
Spearheaded the implementation of new customer instances, including data migration, regression testing, feature development, and training.
Developed and implemented automated customer billing rules, streamlining the billing process.
Provided ongoing support for multiple customer instances, including bug fixes, support queries, and custom feature development.
Designed and developed a GIS tagging and mapping system for a Layer 2 fibre provider, integrating with a network management system via SOAP for auto provisioning of services.
